import React from 'react' import './Cart.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Cart() { const cart = useSelector(state=>state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleRemoveFromCart =(cartItem)=>{ dispatch(re) } return (
